files.title: Rocket Taco: HeyTaco! Inspired Rocket.Chat Bot
files.desc: I felt like HeyTaco!, a teambuilding Slack Bot, would be a great fit for my coop.  However, there was no freely available version of the bot for Rocket.Chat, a self-hosted Slack alternative which my coop was plaaning on using.  So I decided to try to write my own bot in ruby.  This article describes its implementation.

files.title: BSC Uptime: Heartbeat Monitoring Webservice
files.desc: (You can log into the demo using username: admin@bscuptime.com and password: admin.) When I was in college, I built a heartbeat monitoring service to monitor internet outages in my student cooperative.  This article outlines its implementation and design considerations.

files.title: Web Scraping New Grad Software Engineering Jobs
files.desc: One thing that I've learned during my job hunt is that many online job boards are not great at identifying roles for new grads.  To get better results, I scraped some prominent job boards and applied my own filters.  This article describes how my scraper works and how it could be improved.

files.title: Open Source Music Production Setup on Ubuntu
files.desc: I spent a couple days this week building a free, bare-bones music production setup on Ubuntu.  This article describes what I came up with, how to install it on your Ubuntu System, and some of its idiosyncrasies.

files.title: Mock Coding Interview Tool
files.desc: I have been practicing coding interviews with my friends.  Because many of the common coding interview tools (e.g. CodePair, CoderPad, etc) cost money, I decided to build my own using node js and socket io.  This article highlights the design decisions made and analyzes the limitations of this project.

files.title: Simple Discord Chat Bot Graphical User Interfaces
files.desc: Though the discord chatbot api is rather limited, there is a surprising amount of things you can do with bots.  I recently discovered that it is possible to make simple graphical user interfaces with discord chat bots.  By exploiting chat reactions, message editing, and embeds, one can create rudimentary buttons.  In this tutorial, we will implement a bot that displays server status for a set of servers.

files.title: Browser Extension for Permalinking Pages
files.desc: I needed a convenient method for saving job description pages so that I could refer to them later even if they were taken down.  I built a web browser extension that did exactly that.  This article outlines the implementation of the browser extension and analyzes some of the limitations of this approach.
